Description: The head of obstetrics in a 19th century hospital works to discover the cause of the high fatality rate during labor despite their technological advancement compared to the local midwives.

Title: The Naval Treaty
Description: The case of a mysterious document serves to reunite the esteemed Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson twenty years after their retirement.

Title: Widow Wonderland
Description: A professional bounder preys on grief-stricken widows as they visit their husband's graves. He promptly seduces them, and then fleeces them off their money!

Title: Only a Woman
Description: The self-proclaimed daughter of the goddess Dagon recounts the tragic fate of several men who looked down on her.

Title: You Tell Me Your Dream
Description: Two strangers suffer through a recurring dream at the same time in which they are attacked by a faceless predator. When Ed Larsen meets Mark Howgate, they learn of their shared problem and work together to unravel the dream's meaning. Little do they know that their troubles have just begun.

Title: His Fourth Wife
Description: An artist must make the decision of life when he is chosen to pain the fourth potential wife of the infamous King Henry VIII.

Title: The Visions of Sir Philip Sidney
Description: A Zulu War veteran in 19th century London begins to think he is suffering from delusions when he starts seeing people on a train that no one else seems to notice.

Title: Something to Live For
Description: To escape his failing business, an immigrant show owner attempts to commit suicide but is hindered by the sudden appearance of a retired police officer. After recounting his woes, the ex-cop assures the old man that he will put a stop to the local mob's heinous crimes.

Title: Shelter
Description: The threat of nuclear war forces a group of people to take refuge in the bomb shelter of their neighbor. As tension rises, the shelter's owner spreads ill will amongst the camp's members.

Title: The Jataka
Description: After having been given several conflicting reasons by his servants for her mentor's mysterious absence, a young professor begins to suspect foul play.

Title: The Whimpering Pond
Description: While visiting old friends at remote country manor, a novelist chances upon a mysterious figure within the mists shrouding an old pond. He later learns of the strange disappearance of woman and realizes that her restless spirit is haunting the area.

Title: The Hanging Sheriff
Description: A softhearted sheriff has difficulty imposing the death sentence. When his meddlesome wife forces his hand, he is compelled to aid in the prisoner's flight.

Title: The Ghost of Andersonville
Description: After finally being released from the Confederacy's most notorious prison camp, a detainee is requested to stand before a Union General. Despite being a potential presidential candidate, the man refuses due to a deep-seated grudge.

Title: The Last Duel
Description: A subordinate caught playing cards while on guard duty is challenged to a duel by his Lieutenant. Between the two shots, a series of events occur.

Title: Guilty as Charged
Description: A hardware salesman must rely on a polygraph test to prove his innocence when he is pegged as the suspect for a series of crimes he did not have any involvement in.

Title: Dreamers and Killers
Description: When her former lover becomes involved in several mishaps that nearly result in his untimely death, his ex-fianc becomes disturbed by how closely the accidents mirror her dreams!

Title: The Wedding Present
Description: A duo of professional swindlers enlists the services of a hapless American painter in a plot to scam the king of a Balkan country. Determined to pull off the con of the century, the unlikely tag-team work together and in the process, learn that they share a great deal more in common than they realized.

Title: Tourist Trap
Description: A couple in the middle of a much-needed vacation encounters a minor accident on the highway. They make a quick stop to the town of Downville for gas and a quick check-up. When the local mechanic informs them that the car needs major work that will take a few days to accomplish, the man begins to suspect something fishy is taking place.

Title: The Wound That Would Not Heal
Description: After being charged with the murder of his mistress, a man adamantly denies his guilt. However, when the ghost of his dead lover begins to haunt his dreams, he becomes disoriented and begins to believe that the accusation must be true.

Title: The Hills of Arias
Description: In order to escape the rising dictatorship, a Central American revolution flees the country and starts a new life in America as a college professor. Despite being miles away, the revolutionist blood in him refuses to be silenced.

Title: The Imperfect Crime
Description: When asked to complete a report on the death of a rich socialite, a police officer unwittingly discovers a homicide. To make matters worse, the deceased was a former flame. The detective solves the case with the help of his insightful wife.

Title: The Brooch
Description: A governess finds employment at the hand of a strange and extremely prosperous couple. The husband and wife each have their own unique brand of eccentricity.

Title: The Different People
Description: An anthropologist stumbles across a letter written during the Civil War indicating that a group of veterans may have discovered the secret of immortality. In order to validate the information, he tries to locate the whereabouts of the soldiers named in the missive.

Title: Your Desires, My Guilt
Description: A middle class couple learns that they have somehow obtained an ability that allows them to manifest whatever they desire. Their seemingly perfect life takes a turn for the worse when they start abusing their gift.

Title: Why Is This Lady Smiling?
Description: In this fictional tale set in the year 1498, Leonardo da Vinci is commissioned to paint the image of a silk merchant's wife. Playfully altering the woman's natural smile, he came up with a masterpiece that will eventually become an integral part of art history, the Mona Lisa.

Title: The Chess Master
Description: An uneventful game of chess with a stranger in the park leads to a world of adventure for an out-of-work advertising agent.

Title: Lady Macbeth at the Zoo
Description: After unwittingly learning about a murder plot involving a young couple and the man's uncle, Waldo is determined to put a stop to it. The only problem is that Waldo is a caged monkey and despite his best efforts, cannot do a single thing to save the victim.

Title: Two Times Dead
Description: Based on a true story of the man who was framed for his own murder as told by a media reporter.

Title: My First Rogue
Description: A French detective plays a dangerous game of hide-and-seek with a sophisticated and wily art thief.

Title: The Woman Who Wanted to Live
Description: A young blonde witnesses the escape of a convicted felon from a maximum-security prison and the brutal slaying of a guard. When the killer attempts to silence her, she manages to convince him to take her along as a companion instead.

Title: A Most Dangerous Animal
Description: In order to marry the man she loves, the wife of the notorious pugilist 'Killer' Vincent asks for a divorce. Aside from denying her request, he proceeds to brutally beat up her lover. The boxer gets his comeuppance when he steps into the ring with the reigning champion.

Title: The Fifth Man
Description: In order to discover moles and communist spies in the aviation industry, a British journalist works as a secret agent to unmask the traitors.

Title: Universe Hollow
Description: In order to regain her lost credibility, Patricia Ellicott attempts to discredit the people of Universe Hollow when she is assigned to cover a U.F.O. sighting in the town. Phantoms in her past force her to take stock of her life and she must make a difficult choice.

Title: Matching Chairs
Description: Cursed chairs haunt a pair of brothers. Their sibling rivalry comes to a head when one evening, while relaxing in the wing chairs, the young degenerate brother tells him that that the chair he is sitting on has a unique ability to kill.

Title: Don't Kill Me
Description: In order to marry her husband's wealthy compatriot, a woman allows her elderly husband to die from sickness. The man comes back to haunt her.

Title: Escape to Prison
Description: Believing that her friends are part of a huge conspiracy, an executive turns to a local investigator to help her prove that her supposedly deceased husband is alive and well.

Title: Killer Crab
Description: A mysterious sabotage causes the shuttle of Joe Harkness to crash. A robotic weapon called the \"killer crab\" is his only hope for salvation and revenge.

Title: Bring Back My Body
Description: A psychologist attempts to balance out a woman with split personalities in order to save her from the vindictive rage of one of her personas.

Title: The Romance of Mary Oates
Description: After finally finding the man of her dreams, a 40-year old spinster discovers that she has gotten more than she bargained for in her new lover.

Title: Code Word, Caprice
Description: In order to infiltrate a hijacking operation, the police enlist the aid of a conscientious and hard-working trucker.

Title: Come Back Next Week
Description: In order to discover the man who ordered her husband's death, a woman makes a weekly visit to the state prison in order to talk with his killer. In the midst of her investigation, she learns about her husband's many secrets.

Title: The Hand of Amnesia
Description: Despite his marriage to a wealthy widow, a young short-order cook refuses to break up with his former lover. When his wife discovers his infidelity, she throws him out in a fit of jealous rage. He is suspected of foul play when his wife mysteriously disappears.

Title: The Innocent Murderer
Description: In order to escape prosecution and trial for the attempted assassination of Lincoln, John Surratt flees from Canada and makes his way to Liverpool, England.

Title: The Great Catherine
Description: In order to solidify Russia's place among the world's super powers, a Czarina of German descent works to modernize her country. She falls in love with a war hero despite the fact that he is just a common farmer's son.

Title: Formula Z -- The Protector
Description: The new wonder paint, Formula Z is the main ingredient in manufacturing the ink used in fingerprinting suspects and criminals. This becomes the focal point in a game of international intrigue and espionage.

Title: Yearbook
Description: Convinced that she has witnessed a felony, a reclusive widow revisits her high school yearbook for clues.

Title: Adolph and Eva
Description: The beautiful Eva Braun recounts the last days in her life with the feared and hated Adolf Hitler.

Title: Mind Over Mind
Description: A young bank teller is adamant about her innocence when asked about her part in a bank hold-up. Despite statements by a nearby teller implicating her in the crime, she insists that she did not cooperate with the thief in any way.

Title: Redhead
Description: In order to assuage his guilt over the death of an innocent woman whom he dropped off at the wrong stop, a bus driver uses his connections to catch the murderer.

Title: Murder By Decree
Description: A tragic tale about the life and death of the most infamous of Henry VIII's queens, the unfortunate Anne Boleyn.

Title: A Pair of Green Eyes
Description: Murder, mayhem and a lost jewel become the main clues to uncover the truth behind an archaeologist's death.

Title: The Man with the X-Ray Eyes
Description: A county sheriff is taken aback when the prosecutor assigned to the case brings in a psychic to help with their investigation.

Title: Famous Last Words
Description: A young woman loses all credibility when she reports the discovery of a dead person outside a warehouse- only to have the body vanish when the police finally arrive.

Title: Eleanora
Description: An actress playing the part of Shakespeare's Julie recounts her tragic love affair with a Berlin activist during opening night.

Title: Funeral Without a Corpse
Description: An ambitious D.A. succumbs to blackmail in order to safeguard his political aspirations when threatened with the exposure of a terrible secret from his past.

Title: Barn Burner
Description: Chaos ensues when a pair of racehorse owner's substitutes ringers for their steeds in order to pull-of the scam of the century.

Title: How Do You Like Those Apples?
Description: A chance encounter with a psychic allows a cheating spouse to learn about his death. At the same time, his wife begins having strange visions of her husband's murder and tries to find the killer in order to stop him.

Title: The Rim of Eternity
Description: In an attempt to regain his former stature in the media, a hard up reporter works to solve the murder of the town's most wanted criminals.

Title: Scenes from a Murder
Description: In order to remedy his monetary problems, a hard-up music teacher resorts to murder.

Title: The Riddle
Description: At an estate sale, a married couple purchases an old camera and a bunch of yellowed missives. They soon discover that the old letter and pictures in the camera contain clues that will lead them in a mysterious treasure hunt.

Title: The Forbidden House
Description: After purchasing a new home, the young owners encounter an unexpected visitor in the form of an old circus performer. They offer him a place to stay and in exchange, they soon learn the secret surrounding their new house.

Title: Two Sisters
Description: In order to gain an edge against her more popular sister and win the affections of the doctor they are both in love with, the shy sibling is convinced by their Indian servant to impersonate her more gregarious twin.

Title: The Way Station
Description: When they accidentally overhear their father talking to men they know have already passed away, a pair of twins learn that there is more to their gravedigger father than they realize.

Title: Pursuit of a Dream
Description: A fascinating glimpse into the life of the famous Madam Marie Curie as she unraveled the secrets of Radium.

Title: The Force of Evil
Description: In order to exact vengeance against her former lover and his fianc, a rejected woman turns to witchcraft.

Title: Roll Call of the Dead
Description: Despite repeated warnings from their Apache tour guide, East Coast college students explore a dangerous route during their tour of the Wild West. As they press forward, Clark and Jimmy meet members of an old exploration team that mysteriously vanished.

Title: The Million Dollar Leg
Description: In order to recruit a kicker for a professional team, a college football coach must travel behind the Iron Curtain as a favor to an old teammate.

Title: Escape from Anzio
Description: After being shot down over occupied Italy during World War II, an army pilot and his companions must evade being captured by the German soldiers and make it back to neutral territory.

Title: The Ninth Commandment
Description: In a strange turn of events, a wealthy woman falls for a man who tries to break into her house. When he is later arrested for homicide, he sacrifices his freedom for the sake of keeping her safe.

Title: The Abraham Lincoln Murder Trial
Description: On trial for murder, circuit lawyer Abraham Lincoln works to ensure the freedom of a man wrongfully charged. Loosely based on the early years in the life of Lincoln.

Title: The Pale Horse
Description: When he is unexpectedly sent on a brief visit into the after-life, a dying man learns the secret surrounding the disease ravaging his body. Back in the living world, his doctor has a breakthrough.

Title: Tony's Market
Description: The evidence in a convenience store shooting is pieced together by looking into the chain of events in the lives of the killer and his victims before they ended up at the crime scene.

Title: Fly Swatter
Description: Tired of their lives as petty thieves, a husband and wife team attempts to get regular jobs. Their search lands them in the employ of an eccentric couple that has a strange love for flies!

Title: The Flash Point
Description: An engineering executive finds himself losing his memory from the trauma of being laid off. Just as he begins building a new life, the ghosts of his past resurface.

Title: Desert Maiden
Description: In order to come up with a name for their latest fragrance, a middle-aged advertising agent seeks inspiration in the desert. He embarks on a journey of enlightenment when he bumps into a former lover in the sandy dunes.

Title: Last Days of a Dictator
Description: A tragic tale of the rise and fall of one of history's greatest dictators during World War II, Benito Mussolini.

Title: Three Fireflies in a Bottle
Description: Years after their first encounter, a man is reunited with a childhood friend he claims is an alien being. The creature foretells of the destruction of Earth should the human race continue with their evil ways.

Title: Resident Killer
Description: Violence has been eradicated in the nature of man five hundred years into the future. The threat of alien invasion forces the government to reverse a formerly vicious man's programming and unleashes a brutal onslaught against the invaders.

Title: The Voice That Wouldn't Die
Description: Upon hearing a keening and plaintive wail emanating from the ruins of a ruined house at their new manor grounds, a young woman asks her father, a doctor and the local priest to uncover the mystery.

Title: I Hate Harold
Description: When his boss hires a slick and overbearing sales manager, his executive assistant detests him on sight. When he discovers that the man is an expert jewel thief out to rob them blind, he lends his assistance to the local police.

Title: The Sensible Thing
Description: After deciding to marry his assistant, a widower discovers that his wife is incapable of love and that she has a strange and unhealthy attachment to her dog.

Title: The School Mistress
Description: In pre-revolutionary Moscow, a beautiful Russian teacher sets the town ablaze with her torrid love affair.

Title: Portrait of the Past
Description: An unusual coat of arms on an heirloom piece leads a curious jeweler into discovering his uncle's involvement with an 18-year old girl and the mystery surrounding her unexplained death.

Title: The Twelfth Juror
Description: After murdering her married lover in a fit of jealous rage, a wealthy woman blackmails one of her employees into becoming her scapegoat. Her plans of getting away scot-free hit a snag when one of the jurors on the bench refuses to be bribed.

Title: The Magic Dust
Description: A metallurgist stumbles upon a mysterious powder that inherently changes the structure of metal. His research leads him to his old college professor who warns him of the terrible secret shrouding the ancient dust. Despite severe warnings, industrialists seek to capitalize on the dangerous formula.

Title: Diamond Dotty
Description: After killing the miscreants who murdered her husband in an attempt to hijack their diamond mine, a distraught woman confesses to the crime upon her arrival in a western frontier town.

Title: The Smile
Description: When a smile-shaped cloud seemingly follows him wherever he goes, a reporter recently back from an assignment in Tibet shares his paranoid fear with his estranged ex-wife. He is convinced the cloud is stalking him with malevolent intentions.

Title: The Reigate Mystery
Description: The brilliant Sherlock Holmes is tasked to solve a pair of almost identical cases that have resulted in murder.

Title: The Goddess of Death
Description: A beautiful model causes all artists who paint her to become instantly enamored with her. When a moody painter falls for her, he begins to wonder if she is truly of the earthly plane.

Title: The Last Plan
Description: A pair of young quarrelsome and paranoid neighbors enlists the aid of an eccentric old woman to act as mediator. She hires a professional hit man to watch over them and informs them that if one kills the other, they will both die.

Title: The Boatman and the Devil
Description: A young Russian is exiled to Siberia and determined to bring his family with him into the barren wilderness. He is encouraged by the boatman in charge of transporting the exiles to cease his attempts.
